history.content:
Berkeley ANova is a student organization dedicated to empowering students in under-resourced schools and marginalized communities by making access to computer science education and opportunities more equitable, available, and achievable. Our mentors create individualized curriculum to engage our students at each of our middle and high school partner sites with the goal of increasing equitable exposure and accessibility to the tech space.

If you're passionate about CS, education, or working with kids, sign up for virtual tabling and come to our info sessions to learn more. For more information, visit berkeleyanova.org.

~~~ DATES ~~~

January 10 - February 2, 12pm-5pm PST — Virtual Tabling 

January 28, Thursday 7pm-8:30pm PST — Info Session 1

February 2, Tuesday 7pm-8:30pm PST — Info Session 2 

All event details and links can be found at berkeleyanova.org/join! 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

APPLY at berkeleyanova.org/join by February 2, 11:59pm. 

Berkeley ANova | Spring ‘21 Recruitment 

Instagram: @berkeleyanova

TikTok: @berkeleyanova
